hiveArticle.title: When Famous Site like Quora Publishes its Code without Testing
hiveArticle.body:
So while going through the Feed I just noticed that Quora is showing Server Error on its page thus something might be not working as expected. But the site which is 127 ranked as per Alexa should not be published its code without testing.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmechUZ9Ey7ybcpmw2WHdJ7USpGRHYvqxmSe3CcYUjM1Av/image.png)

pageContext.title: When Famous Site like Quora Publishes its Code without Testing
